Description.Details: Intended for use as supporting fire at very long range, AC/2s deal moderate damage with low heat and a large ammunition count per ton. This AC/2 suffers from <color=#dd7e6b> -2 Recoil/refire penalty </color>, when continuously fired. Your pilots guts skill can counteract this. Additionally, <color=#f79924>AC2s have a damage variance of +/- 5 points of damage.</color>
